评论概述: Sizing is awful and they gave me a used pair
评论详情: The first order I placed for my 9 and 11 year olds. I got the size 9-10 for my very petite 9 year old, and it fit with room to grow, but not overly big. The next size up I ordered for my very skinny and tall 11 year old, so I ordered her the 11-12…. The 11-12 that came was a size L on the tag, and it fit me, a 5’6 165 pound woman with size D chest!!!! I decided, I’ll keep them for me and order her a new pair in the size 9-10, just received those today, and they have clearly been used. The seller didn’t even take the time to reattach the tag, just threw it in the bag with a pair of crumpled up in a ball, wrinkled pajamas, and the unattached tag. I’m going to wash and keep them because my daughter REALLY wanted them to take on vacation with her cousins. But I’ll never buy from this seller again! If you happen to get an unused size that fits your child, they do seem to be comfy and good quality, which is the only reason I am giving it 3 stars.

评论详情: We have 5 pairs of these pajamas. I wish they made adult sizes because I’ve gotten some and none of them are as good as these.  We’ve had a few pairs for well over a year and they’re still in great condition. No seams coming apart, no shrinking, no issues at all.  I do hang dry these because I just do not put a lot of clothes in the dryer. However, I have accidentally dried them and nothing negative happened at all.  Also, I am very sensitive to static electricity and I haven’t actually noticed any with these. I highly recommend these to everyone!  My child is 47” and 44lbs. We got the 5-6.
